title: Lepus
summaries: Lepus is a pre-Hardmode boss that can be summoned anywhere and at any time of day with the Suspicious Looking Egg, which is dropped by Lepus itself, Corrupt Bunnies and Diseaster Bunnies during the Easter season.
While Lepus is alive, the music Boss 1 will play.
